recipe_name: Linguine with chilli, lemon and basil
author: Garrey Dawson
method: For the basil paste, place the basil and olive oil into a small food processor, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and blend until smooth. For the linguine, heat the oil in a pan and gently fry the chilli and garlic for 1-2 minutes. Add the lemon juice, chopped basil leaves and cooked linguine and stir well to coat the pasta. To serve, place the linguine into a serving dish and top with a dollop of basil paste.
